note.p: Burial: A mausoleum in Stourton churchyard, Wiltshire

Career: Entered the Banking House, 37 Fleet Street, London (at an early age), but left when the Stourhead property was entrusted to him by his maternal grandfather; devoted himself to travel, antiquarian research and topography (after the death of his wife)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1838 No 35 p 93
